short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help us understand which websites matter to you

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Perxcept (read as “percept”) is a Google Chrome extension by ZoomRx that passively monitors your exposure to healthcare-related content across select websites. None of your personal information is collected as part of this research. 

Your contributions will help other doctors, patients, and hospitals stay up-to-date on the latest in healthcare news and developments.

Perxcept is currently invite-based, so only users who have been sent an invite code will be able to sign in and participate.

Instructions to install:

Click on “Add to Chrome” and then ”Add extension” in the pop-up
Enter your personalized invite code sent to your email ID
Select the websites you want to share with us, and we’re good to go

Note - On selecting “Add to Chrome”, you will see a pop-up which says Perxcept can “read and change all data on the websites you visit”. However, Perxcept solely captures only the content from websites you’ve granted us access to and not alter any content on the visited websites.

Please contact info@perxcept.com for additional information.
